name: shizam
description: configures a package to fall inline with cdaringe standards

scripts.preversion: git checkout master && git pull && npm ls
scripts.publish-patch: npm run preversion && npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm run preversion && npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish-major: npm run preversion && npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.postpublish: npm run docs && npm run deploy-docs

author: cdaringe
